---
title: "Note"
date: "`r Sys.Date()`"
format:
  html:
    css: [css/font.css, css/link.css]
---

```{r results='asis'}
#| echo: false
note_file <- list.files(path = "./note", pattern = "*.html", recursive = TRUE)
sprintf("<a href='note/%s'>%s</a>", note_file, stringr::str_remove(string = note_file, ".html")) |> cat(sep = "\n\n")
```
